после того как киллер 5 раз повесил меня на крюк, я стал задумываться о смысле жизни и уже не пытался сбежать от сущности...............

If you caught this game on sale Halloween for $8 then its certainly a steal.  I ended up paying $20 and to be honest it was worth that amount of money for me.  Being a survivor can become a bit repetitive as there are really only a few objectives you are to be completing, but it can be fun if the killer is a good player and you find yourself in chases trying to earn points.  If you have a group of 5 people for customs then this game will really give you the fun you are looking for..

It could just be my connection, but it can take a bit searching to become a killer, but I would say it brings the most fun mostly because you are free roaming and looking to kill others and hang them on the hooks.  There is certainly a lot of things that could be done to give this game better legs, but if you are looking for something that you can sit down for an hour and have a few thrills this might be the game.  I wouldn't guess many people find their lives consumed with this game, but it gave me a good change of pace from DayZ and I have enjoyed it.
This game is so much fun and is just an overall perfect horror game especially when playing with friends. 100% recommend it to anyone looking for a fun and re-playable horror pvp game.

Too survivor sided, not fun. The game's balanced around the assumption that the survivors are strangers with no chat, so when you run into a 4 man using Discord the game falls apart and the survivors are unstoppable.

It's incredible how this game has a lot of bugs and overpowered add-ons and sometimes it can be unbalanced, especially for killers, but I still come back everytime to have fun and play with my friends even if the game is like this. Definetly would recommend to anyone.

They finally did it, they nerfed OoO and DS, praise be to The Duke for we do not deserve such amazing gifts! And I play survivor a lot too, they were broken and greedy skills that literally broke the game flow. Now we can finally sneak up on those pesky survivors without an OoO marking our every move and we can hook people without having to worry as much though I still think DS would be a pain I feel its so much better now and not every single survivor is running it!

Купил игру Dead by Daylight в 2016 году,по началу в игру заходил пару раз за месяц.Потом спустя годы,начал узнавать о этой игре всё.Стало очень интересно играть.Ты можешь играть как и за выжившего и так и за маньяка,выбери на чей стороне ты,надоело играть за сурвов,не беда,играй за мана.Это хоть как то разнообразит  твою игру.Бери с собой друзей,которые понимают в этой игре,которые тебе объяснят всё детально,что тебе делать.Купив игру поначалу чувствуешь страх, атмосферу нагнетающегося ужаса.Это же Хоррор игра, но спустя 10-20 игр,а может быть даже больше 100 наигранных часов,ты забываешь о страхе перед маньяком.Но в некоторых моментах всё равно твой пульс зашкаливает)Игра отличная!9/10
Достоинства:Графика,как по мне сойдет.Отличные саундтреки.Атмосфера.Захватывающий гемплей.Игру часто обновляют,активность разработчиков.
Недостатки:Присутствуют баги. Вылет из игры,но не так часто.Можно встретить читеров.Токсичные игроки,которые обсирают тебя после игры.Поиск игры за Мана долгий.Нет голосового чата,мб это и к лучшему.Но все эти недостатки простительны,игре всего 4 года.Надеюсь в скором времени игра будет ещё лучше.
메튜야 게임 똑띠 안만드냐 버그만 문제가 아니라 인성존 잠수함 패치는 아니지 매칭시스템은 고칠생각이 영원이 없는거니? 그리고 거지같은 콘솔유저랑 같이 매칭되는거 토나온다 빨리 서버 구분해라
buenisimo el juego.... eso que mas queres?

Está bueno para cagarte de risa con tus amigos. Me faltó aclarar que es un juego en el que tenes que tener paciencia en el sentido de que van a tocarte tanto survivors como asesinos tóxicos o juegan de mala manera.

Overall, devs have done their best to improve the game, and it's definitely fun and addicting to play. However, there is a lot of room for cheats, and the game favors survivors more than killers in terms of gameplay. The skins are well made, and both killers and survivors have ''killer'' perks and items (you see what I did there?). I would give DBD an 8/10 because I think it needs more improvements. Other than that, very fun to play!

Super fun! I played when it first came out on ps4. Years later i got a PC and downloaded it. Now my entire house has the game and we do SWF all the time, with killer games too! Its also pretty easy to get the hang of. LOVE the game!
Definitely fun to play with friends

It's Dead by Daylight, what more can expect out of it? It has it's flaws just like every other game out there, with the release of more content it just gets better and better.

I have always loved Horror movies and by playing this game, it's as though I'm IN the movie.  It's a lot of fun, is challenging and can give you real jump scares.  What I dislike about this is that the way to get to different aspects of the rewards isn't always clear.  Trial and error got me to find them, but it'd be nice if it was more clear.
I like every part of this game

O jogo é bastante viciante e com jogabilidade muito boa, porém algumas otimizações poderiam ser feitas para que o jogo consumisse menos memória RAM, pois mesmo em computadores com ótimas especificações, o jogo tende a ter algumas quedas de FPS, o que pode ser bastante irritante e faz com que se aproveite menos do game em si! 
Esquecendo esse detalhe, o jogo por si só é bem interativo, temos vários personagens que são muito bem feitos (outros nem tanto, e o melhor de tudo é que ele é um game cooperativo multiplayer, ou seja, podemos jogar com nossos amigos, e/ou até fazer amigos dentro do próprio game!
fun sometimes it takes a while to get into a game
玩这个游戏不管是人类还是屠夫都有点容易上头。
